entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 5:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
